markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Water Step](/Feats.aspx?ID=455) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 162 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Elementalist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=98) (Level 8)

</column>

---

You can Stride across liquid and surfaces that don’t support your weight. This benefit lasts only during your movement. If you end your movement on a surface that can’t support you, you fall in or it collapses as normal.
name: Water Step

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 6" pfs="Standard" > Water Step Source Core Rulebook pg. 162 4.0 Archetype Elementalist (Level 8) --- You can Stride across liquid and surfaces that don’t support your weight. This benefit lasts only during your movement. If you end your movement on a surface that can’t support you, you fall in or it collapses as normal.
